name: Pizza Mexicana - Steak

description: Flour tortilla topped with cheese and tomato sauce. Served with chicken.

name: Chicken Tenders & Fries
description: Crispy chicken tenders served with fries.

description: A classic cheese quesadilla served with crispy fries.

name: Guacamole
description: Additional sides

name: Mar Y Tierra
description: Grilled steak topped with your choice of shrimp pr lobster tail.

name: Crab Legs
description: Succulent crab legs served with you choice of butter garlic, ajillo, kora sauce, or cajun seasoning.

name: Langostino
description: Langostino prepared in you choice of ajillo or garlic butter sauce.

name: Octopus
description: Grilled octopus with house butter, potato, salad, and chef's adobo, served with one side; you can upgrade the sauce to Kora or Ajillo.

name: Paella No Paella
description: Yellow rice in paella style with seafood.

name: Aguachile
description:
Shrimp cooked in lime juice with your choice of sauce:
*Traditional Green 
*Mango
*Red
*Mixed

description: Grilled salmon filet covered with you choice of sauce or ajillo (garlic) sauce.

description: Filet sauteed with garlic.

name: Filete A La Carta - Empanizado
description: Breaded and fried filete.

name: FIlete 123
description: Fish fillet grilled and filled with mixed seafood, covered in a chipotle and cheese sauce.

name: Filete Agave
description: Fish fillet grilled and filled with shrimp, onions, and mushrooms, then covered in a cheese sauce.

name: Filete Poblano
description: Fish fillet cooked with butter and covered in a poblano pepper cream sauce.

name: Red Snapper
description: Fried red snapper includes two sides and upgrade with house spicy sauce.

name: Mojarra
description: Fried mojarra includes two sides and upgrade with house spicy sauce.

name: Bacon Bomb Shrimps
description: Shrimp wrapped in bacon and cheese, served with chipotle mayo sauce (8 Pieces.)

name: Rebosados Shrimps
description: Shrimp filled with Philadelphia cheese and topped with a special mango sauce. Served with mashed potatoes and pineapple salad (10 Pieces.) (sides not included)

name: Ajillo Shrimps
description: Shrimp sauteed in garlic.

name: Main Mexico Shrimps
description: Shrimp cooked in butter with mushrooms, cram, and chipotle, covered with gratin cheese. (10 Pieces)

name: Zarandeados Shrimps
description: Butterfly shrimp with shell, grilled with house adobo, served with potatoes, and salad. (10 pieces)

name: Campechano Cocketels
description: Fresh seafood selection of your choice, prepared Mexican-style with lime juice, onions, tomato, cucumber, and cilantro. Served with campechano.

name: Octopus Cocketels
description: Fresh seafood selection of your choice, prepared Mexican-style with lime juice, onions, tomato, cucumber, and cilantro. Served with octopus.

name: Shrimp Cocketels
description: Fresh seafood selection of your choice, prepared Mexican-style with lime juice, onions, tomato, cucumber, and cilantro. Served with shrimp.

name: Torre de Mariscos Ceviche
description: Fresh seafood selection marinated in lime juice with tomato, red onion, cucumber, cilantro, and our house special sauce. Served with mixed seafood tower (octopus, calamari, shrimp, scallops, and mussels).

name: Playero Ceviche
description: Fresh seafood selection marinated in lime juice with tomato, red onion, cucumber, cilantro, and our house special sauce. Served with mixed seafood (octopus, calamari, shrimp, scallops, and mussels) in a habanero sauce.

name: Especial Ceviche
description: Fresh seafood selection marinated in lime juice with tomato, red onion, cucumber, cilantro, and our house special sauce. Served with shrimp in a tangy clamato sauce.

name: Chef Ceviche
description: Fresh seafood selection marinated in lime juice with tomato, red onion, cucumber, cilantro, and our house special sauce. Served with fish in a black sauce.

name: Gratinandos - 12 Pieces
description: Grilled with garlic, butter, chef's seasoning, and melted cheese. Served with a dozen oysters.

name: Gratinandos - 6 Pieces
description: Grilled with garlic, butter, chef's seasoning, and melted cheese. Served with half a dozen oysters.

description: Grilled with garlic, butter, and chef's adobo seasoning. Served with a dozen oysters.

description: Grilled with garlic, butter, and chef's adobo seasoning. Served with half a dozen oysters.

name: Ceviche - 12 Pieces
description: Freshly prepared ceviche served on top. Served with a dozen oysters.

name: Ceviche - 6 Pieces
description: Freshly prepared ceviche served on top. Served with half a dozen oysters.

name: Natural Oysters - 12 Pieces
description: Raw oysters served with lime and a special soy sauce. Served with a dozen oysters.

name: Natural Oysters - 6 Pieces
description: Raw oysters served with lime and a special soy sauce. Served with half a dozen oysters.

name: Shrimp Pasta
description:
Creamy alfredo pasta with mushrooms, green peppers, and onions, topped with parmesan cheese, and a sprinkle of fresh parsley. 
Served with shrimp.

name: Chicken Pasta
description:
Creamy alfredo pasta with mushrooms, green peppers, and onions, topped with parmesan cheese, and a sprinkle of fresh parsley. 
Served with chicken.

name: Seafood Soup
description:
A comforting bowl of soup, served with a slice of garlic bread.
Assorted seafood soup with potatoes and carrots.

name: Shrimp Soup or Bisque Soup
description:
A comforting bowl of soup, served with a slice of garlic bread.
Choose between our rich and velvety shrimp bisque or a traditional coastal shrimp soup with potatoes and carrots.

name: Chicken Soup
description:
A comforting bowl of soup, served with a slice of garlic bread. 
Chicken soup blend of mushrooms, zucchini, corn, spinach, potatoes, and carrots.

name: Vegetable Soup
description:
A comforting bowl of soup, served with a slice of garlic bread.
A savory blend of mushrooms, zucchini, corn, spinach, potatoes, and carrots.

name: Wings - 12 Piece

description: Fried wings topped with your choice of buffalo, BBQ, or mango sauce. Served with french fries, carrots, and celery.

name: Rib Eye
description: Juicy rib eye steak grilled (14 oz.)

name: Arrachera
description: Grilled skirt steak

name: Grilled Pepito Sandwich - Birria
description:
A flavorful sandwich with your choice of protein, layered with melted cheese, creamy guacamole, lettuce, onions, tomatoes, and mayo, served on a grilled bun, served with french fries. 
Served with birria, slow-cooked beef (no sides included)

name: Grilled Pepito Sandwich - Steak
description:
A flavorful sandwich with your choice of protein, layered with melted cheese, creamy guacamole, lettuce, onions, tomatoes, and mayo, served on a grilled bun, served with french fries. 
Served with sirloin steak.

name: Grilled Pepito Sandwich - Grilled Chicken
description:
A flavorful sandwich with your choice of protein, layered with melted cheese, creamy guacamole, lettuce, onions, tomatoes, and mayo, served on a grilled bun, served with french fries. 
Served with grilled chicken.

name: Birria Tacos
